derivation: or קֹל; from an unused root meaning to call aloud;
outline:
1. voice, sound, noise
    1. voice
    2. sound (of instrument)
  2. lightness, frivolity
kjv_def: [phrase] aloud, bleating, crackling, cry ([phrase] out), fame, lightness, lowing, noise, [phrase] hold peace, (pro-) claim, proclamation, [phrase] sing, sound, [phrase] spark, thunder(-ing), voice, [phrase] yell.
